forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Thunder possible. High around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Thunder possible. High near 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow late. Low 2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low around 35F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low around 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 34F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 57F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny in the morning. Increasing clouds with showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
